Plot: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.
Title: Waking Life
Actors: Trevor Jack Brooks, Lorelei Linklater, Wiley Wiggins, Glover Gill
tomatoConsensus: Waking Life's inventive animated aesthetic adds a distinctive visual component to a film that could easily have rested on its smart screenplay and talented ensemble cast.
